name: BuildBundle.Attributes
desc: The attributes that describe a Build Bundles resource.

items.name: bundleId
items.desc: The bundle ID of the build bundle.

items.name: bundleType
items.desc: The type of the build bundle.

items.name: deviceProtocols
items.desc: The protocols that the app uses to communicate with external accessory hardware. For more information, see UISupportedExternalAccessoryProtocols.

items.name: dSYMUrl
items.desc: The URL to the symbolication file for the app or App Clip.

items.name: entitlements
items.desc: Entitlement information for your app or App Clip.

items.name: fileName
items.desc: The name of the build bundle.

items.name: hasOnDemandResources
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the build bundle contains on-demand resources.

items.name: hasPrerenderedIcon
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the build bundle contains a pre-rendered app icon.

items.name: hasSirikit
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the build bundle contains an app or App Clip that allows users to interact with it through voice, intelligent suggestions, and personalized workflows.

items.name: includesSymbols
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the build bundle includes symbol information for debugging and crash reports.

items.name: isIosBuildMacAppStoreCompatible
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether an iOS app included in the build bundle is included on the Mac App Store.

items.name: locales
items.desc: The specified locale. Refer to BetaAppLocalizationCreateRequest.Data.Attributes for possible values.

items.name: platformBuild
items.desc: The build number of the OS you used to build the app or App Clip.

items.name: requiredCapabilities
items.desc: An array of capabilities that your app or App Clip requires.

items.name: sdkBuild
items.desc: A string that identifies the SDK you used to build your app or App Clip.

items.name: supportedArchitectures
items.desc: An array of supported CPU architectures that your app or App Clip supports.

items.name: usesLocationServices
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the app or App Clip included in the build bundle uses location services.
